title: Made for Each Other 1939 (Drama, Romance) Carole Lombard, James Stewart, Charles Coburn

sources.title: Made for Each Other 1939 (Drama, Romance) Carole Lombard, James Stewart, Charles Coburn
sources.description:
The whole town is talking about this grand down-to-earth love drama! 
Young lawyer John Mason hastily marries Jane, challenges of skeptical in-laws, financial struggles, and unexpected tragedies test their love and resolve amidst life's unpredictability.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/NiYJliPNlhQ

Original title: Made for Each Other (1939)
This film is available with English, Italian & German audio options, and subtitled in many languages.


Director: John Cromwell
Writers: Jo Swerling, Rose Franken 
Stars: Carole Lombard, James Stewart, Charles Coburn 
Genre: Classics, Comedy, Drama, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with dubbed audio & subtitles)
02:38 Unexpected marriage leads to challenges and surprises for Mr. Mason and his new wife, Jane.
09:56 A newlywed couple faces unexpected challenges and surprises as they embark on a journey together.
16:42 Struggles with household preparations and servant issues before a dinner party lead to tension and ultimatums.
23:12 A dinner conversation leads to the announcement of a new partner in a law firm.
31:09 A courtroom drama unfolds as a couple navigates the challenges of parenthood and household dynamics.
42:01 Struggling husband seeks recognition and advancement at work, encouraged by his supportive wife.
46:58 A couple faces financial challenges and sacrifices in their professional lives, leading to a heartfelt conversation about their relationship.
59:46 A woman feels unappreciated at home on New Year's Eve, leading to misunderstandings and family tension.
1:05:25 Family struggles and medical emergency test a young couple's marriage in a classic romantic drama.
1:14:25 Desperate father seeks help from Judge Doolittle to save his dying baby with pneumonia.
1:20:42 A couple faces challenges in their relationship, family, and career, with a miraculous event changing their lives.


@CultCinemaClassics
